headline: American Tower Corporation’s (AMT) Role in a Diversified Telecom Dividend Portfolio
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is included among the 11 Best Telecom Dividend Stocks to Buy for 2025. American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is engaged in operating, acquiring, and developing communications real estate, including cell towers and data centers, both in the U.S. and abroad. Its primary business involves leasing space on these sites to wireless carriers […]
